General.Name: Thai Agro Energy Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Agro Energy Public Company Limited produces and distributes ethanol for fuel in Thailand. It also offers potassium humate, a soil improver. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Thai Agro Energy Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Lanna Resources Public Company Limited.

2.Name: Ms. Somrudee  Suwannaroop
